channel.title: forcing Arabic language by default on the Arabic section
channel.description:
on the Arabic section , how can we force the Arabic language when the user open it with out the need to be a user in the forum or if he a user no need to change anything from his profile ? i think now the forum being stabilized for good time, thats why i think its the time to mention this now.
or should i communicate with discourse forum to solve this issue?
every time someone need to enter his profile and change the language from English to Arabic then Arabic to English = really not useable.

item.title: forcing Arabic language by default on the Arabic section
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
This is now not needed, As there is no point in having different languages support if the wiki only in english.

Read full topic

item.description:
Plugin broken. Disabled it.

Discourse Meta

Localized categories plugin

A plugin to set a category‚Äôs locale based off it‚Äôs slug. This plugin allows you to set the locale for individual categories by basing the category slug off the locale‚Äôs language code. For example, for Persian set the category‚Äôs slug to fa-ir. The...
